title: Los Angeles/Northwest
name: MacArthur Park
content: This park has been famous for a long time, starting with Charlie Chaplin, who made several films at the lake here. In the 90's its reputation was tainted by violence and drug use, but the park has been cleaned up over the last few years, and is once again a decent place to visit. Take a paddle boat out on the small lake or watch one of the ever-present soccer matches.
